item.title: 以色列 - 伊朗空战进入第二周，欧洲推动外交 - 路透社
item.description: 以色列 - 伊朗空战进入第二周，欧洲推动外交＆nbsp; nbsp; reuters 实时更新：以色列 - 伊朗冲突，弹道导弹攻击，特朗普称我们的参与＆nbsp; 6f6f6f“> cnn 伊朗导弹罢工医院，促使以色列报复威胁＆nbsp; 《华盛顿邮报》 href =“ https://news.google.com/rss/articles/cbmiwkfvx3lxtfbazxnnd2nuywrztlp1zhjyoey5vgkx S0S0RM0ZBNLRVUXUMUGYB0ZAUUJ2AM43BXKTRE1SEFBGRENUTTAYWERNZVHG2N1POMDRUNEHUSGW0QQ？oc = 5“ Target =“ _ Blank”>以色列医院被伊朗导弹罢工击中＆nbsp;＆nbsp; bbc live：以色列，伊朗贸易导弹大火；伊朗会见欧洲官员的FM ＆nbsp; 半岛电视台

item.title: 随着特朗普似乎推迟了美国的行动，伊朗导弹登上以色列医院 - 《纽约时报》
item.description: 伊朗导弹击中以色列医院，因为特朗普似乎推迟了美国的行动＆nbsp; 纽约时报href =“ https://news.google.com/rss/articles/cbmid0fvx3lxtfbldfbldefpb2zxdgs3utl3vwzmm0htmjqtuk9ovuxiqvnpywzga119 razzsakh1mnfzuldsbmnnd2e0zuzlnmtuzk91wgpvz2fonhnazm1osxn5zjl6eurishpose4ws0p5wnbydmntwnbydmntwtmntwtmntwtmntwtmntwtf2mu04dfbdmefr？ target =“ _ blank”>实时更新：以色列发誓要加强伊朗导弹袭击医院＆nbsp; nbsp; 纽约时报href =“ https://news.google.com/rss/articles/cbmi3gfbvvv95cuxoohytvwvxeliyutleuevkrkrkgzqnzqnzyu E1MA2PBVMLPSWL3BMRRK45X0LGUVV5WWWGTQWI5AUZGVLBFVDFSAERZSSTXDHSFB5WLBFB5WLBFQVRID1EZTVOWB21XC undzhbvrnhvtexycuzlwgpppewosc1pbfp6sw56nklswxznr09wamdwyunivursntlvuhnmakpxugdmznfwakxos liwdjlra0totgtwrv9tehutovnnovnqm2ppy1d5nfdruvkwcnnru2dedzbpte13ogyymnl1d01d01ut2nfwmc？oc = 5“ target =“ _空白”>伊朗与集群炸弹发射导弹，因为与以色列的冲突进入第八天＆nbsp; nbsp; 印度今日 伊朗罢工以色列医院；特朗普决定在“两周”内决定美国在冲突中的作用href =“ https://news.google.com/rss/articles/cbmikwfbvv95cuxqv0l6wxntowf4sc01rgrgrncgk2nndjuzztb 0Q2Y1ZMQZRPQ2Q2U1C4R1JJTXN5RGPZSVNWU3BTULRWCHD1YLHAS3N1TJYZRXVYCJZ6Y1PIU1BAZUHVBZUHVBZVNVNVNVNVNVNPMX01RVL JXTG9JQXZNSWNNLXDAV3HLEHRVZGPOMMSWZHRZCZLZCZLFSEJVKVKVZU0W1B1HSAVZBVV95CUXQT1GWSVROVNJTZG1HZZL telc4tc1rd2hjqxh1evhhawf1qi1dbxvbzwp5tdrrbmdvq3nvrjvyvmzberqrtzbdhjhvkflteffrnb4ywtfqq？oc = 5英寸target =“ _ blank”>德黑兰社区空排出，以色列和伊朗交换幕＆nbsp; nbsp; nbc News

item.title: IAEA：IDF击中伊朗的Arak重水反应堆之后，不必担心“放射学效应” - 以色列时代
item.description: 以色列袭击了一个不活跃的伊朗核地点。＆nbsp;＆nbsp; 纽约时报 href="https://news.google.com/rss/articles/CBMiqwFBVV95cUxNWVQxdWZZUndrT0NBeTltcVJTa0lSSTlKeUp6MTBqdVFqekd2TkJvOHZMMEtCUkZhUkZETjlOUjYzNnM2N0J 3ttnhmzrhnujhouq0nmlbcm80lvzqnljwwg9ysdyznexlc0tkugrkrkrkrkvmrmnwavlrszvwd3 ziu0dlbzlxckhiahdvznnyczlcwjfkt2xoz3pnz2lnwkxfmzv4vdy4vdy4zvlfcej4emm？oc = 5“ Target =“ _ Blank”>伊朗的Arak重水反应堆被以色列空袭击中，是德黑兰的核交易的一部分 href="https://news.google.com/rss/articles/CBMiowFBVV95cUxOZ29fZFAyRVNiU0hmTmNQekdWdjVFWXU0ZWx0YVV4X0FiY1NRNkZJLW1XVmgzM09ZTWd3c2lZdDBTW vy1c0dbrk5guyt2ezz01qsmjyc1nfatjwdzdkowxumeu4z1fvwuznkedubnkedubnkennkynfqzafprz09uwuzbrg1qrlg1qrlliwglllliwglllllllllllllllllllllllllllllllllllllllllllllliNzriffblbbbbbbb2xtcjr3dy1wddy1wsfzxvezxvezxvezd3y4mmmmmmmm = oc oc cocvezd3y4mmmmmmmmmmmmmmmm target =“ _空白”>伊朗更新特别报告，2025年6月19日，晨报href =“ https://news.google.com/rss/articles/cbmiggfbvv95cuxns3dpdpdfn1tmviq0t4vg1mwxz1r2vveuddakmxrnbsdjlradzkrgjiddr 2BJDCMXV3DNZJTMO0LV94ZULLX0Z1VXH2NGXWWXNEVLZKAFFSTVUZEDH3D1J5BDJ2NVL1CVLQRVLQRVLQRVZMMHFUUU5OMLFU5OMLFVCGRRN3ZVCGRRN3ZVWGG5PCCXKQVJN？ target =“ _ blank”>更新伊朗的发展＆nbsp;＆nbsp; 国际原子能机构

item.title: 这个俄勒冈人作为志愿者去了基辅。他死于俄罗斯袭击。 - 《纽约时报》
item.description: 这个俄勒冈人作为志愿者去了基辅。他死于俄罗斯的袭击。＆nbsp;＆nbsp; 纽约时报 Zelenskyy要求在乌克兰首都致命的导弹罢工后对俄罗斯施加更大的压力href =“ https://news.google.com/rss/articles/cbmiwkfvx3lxte5ebwlzwwqythvmngdkylfcztfwtfwtjix nkdlcljvmu12z1bxqxjjsugfkyktpd2rfzhrbbznjy0lpbmizunnvzeuwc0zrd3disxg1vnpsn1bmaw9fqq？oc = 5英寸target =“ _ blank”>在基辅度过了恐怖之夜之后，寻找死亡的搜索＆nbsp; nbsp; bbc kyiv哀悼，因为俄罗斯罢工的死亡人数攀升至28 ＆nbsp; nbsp; reuters 乌克兰，俄罗斯在致命的罢工中谈论不确定的＆nbsp; nbsp; Vatican News

item.title: 据信的尸体是伊朗导弹罢工后的瓦砾时代发现的玛丽亚·佩什克罗娃（Maria Peshkuryova）
item.description: 被认为是伊朗导弹罢工后的瓦砾中发现的玛丽亚·佩什克罗娃（Maria Peshkuryova） href =“ https://news.google.com/rss/articles/cbmioafbvv95cuxqucutnerxhzzjiyqjrgqjrgqwk5a2leqs1hy0llywflaha1mzb1mzb1vnuxmhzzbwrethzzbwrethzbwretwretwretwretwretwretwret29ut29ut29utwtldlderxwnrqcc1c ccc1c 5WHNDX0dCQWRNWmxodTlBanpBUC1jWDJkZjR0Q2tQU2dpYU9PSmIwLVlLNHJEVVZJYjd2MUs0eWpJR2ltUkdmX0lHcW51amxSZHhEY1BUY3BaNHVUeWdlNGlsdGJNcXVw?oc=5" target =“ _ blank”>乌克兰逃往以色列。伊朗的导弹破碎了她的新生活＆nbsp; ap news 在伊朗的伊朗导弹罢工中，将住宅块减少到瓦砾＆nbsp; 以色列时报href =“ https://news.google.com/rss/articles/cbmixefvx3lxte9ya2rfdkq0cglqrgttdktdktuy3zhs0j3y 1Q2UI1HR0V0RTHTQ2FZVFLTWMRQETZNMW5WCDLW9IM2VLDDLWVLEWB2HTQVVLVDUTNE5XBWZABEJXRC1F？OC = 5“ target =“ _ blank”>以色列市的市长被伊朗罢工击中，说精神很强＆nbsp; 耶路撒冷邮报href =“ https://news.google.com/rss/articles/cbmiwkfvx3lxte1gm2dhehk5n3zotk5qtjzwqjrwwgdv nlpdvkzgblhlnfvmt0xlyvzlcnjlagdysxdkt0fmqmqmqmqwtllrcupnnxayluzomvpdcfpdcfhjatjvr3l4yjl5uq？oc = 5“ target =“ _ blank”>'他们很虚弱'：以色列人背部与伊朗在被导弹击中的社区中的冲突＆nbsp; bbc

item.title: 西班牙拒绝北约预期的5％的国防支出提案为“不合理” - 美联社新闻
item.description: 西班牙拒绝北约预期的5％防御支出提案为'不合理' href =“ https://news.google.com/rss/articles/cbmirafbvv95cuxpzfhnwnwnwnwnwnkzczczjsvdjxwkxtowozymzwvlphewvlphewvssedaqvssedaqvvbupfevbupfevbb1awe3bbui5zf9zv9zv0tfemi4c GF1Q0o4eFB0cDY1bEdpNDNPTS1WbWVHTmRiaUhNOWQ1R1dKNTA3SkFXZjBHSHJpNzhiUWQ0TmxhSTlsVnNtOHhpck5LcjMtQXR6MVkxTmIwOFJHdGFjaDdwb2tBTWpqTUVuY kxSRm1laEdEUFZw0gGyAUFVX3lxTE9EUlBUVmVDMTBBbVROWFVyTVBpOE9lSGd4VHlLSDI0ZXVKRkdGaE85TjloUWh3THRhMnBPQWk1c2oyMTF1TXJfVlZDWWtxS25NSFc4T 3BReWZpZjYzdkJEb0tIdWpKbXk5LWtWdW52UFlfOEQ1VDhBNEZsazU2bGpHQlBKNWhTbENkVElJRkJMNnBVQWtSWV8wNzZFMWFCWE5ON1NhSWQtcUczTW5ERXRTZ1E?oc=5" target =“ _ blank”>西班牙拒绝北约的5％国防支出徒步徒步作为'适得其反的'＆nbsp; nbsp; al href =“ https://news.google.com/rss/articles/cbmicefvx3lxte1jsghontvswi1juvnhr1rrykx33otdoofpjaeqyqyqkvomxm 1D1NACZBSVF9JA1L6V20TNHDIZHLHCWDSX0U3MKI4RFP2CTJSN1RWMG9IBFDUR1PJM3VRR1ZHMDLUDLZ1RKTIUENNENENENNENENENNENEHLDOOEY？ Target =“ _ blank”>西班牙威胁要使北约峰会胜出特朗普国防目标＆nbsp; nbsp; Financial Times 西班牙希望豁免北约5％的国防支出目标＆nbsp; nbsp; politico.eu.eu 瑞典议会撤回$ 310亿美元的借款以提高国防＆nbsp; REUTERS

item.title: 特朗普否认批准伊朗攻击计划，但将在“两周内”做出决定|唐纳德·特朗普 - 监护人

item.title: 医务人员说，至少有12名巴勒斯坦人杀死了在加沙的援助 - 英国广播公司
item.description: 至少有12名巴勒斯坦人杀害了加沙的援助，例如 href =“ https://news.google.com/rss/articles/cbmitafbvv95cuxqsqsjjyqjjrmafl5t1h2ru5lcnhsluvppewr3c3c3c3c3fjyw1yw1ywdy4enpou3y4enpou3y4sgtvdfuffuffu3 fyffuf3hsgfr3fytfythfytfythfytfyth.wry4nsgfryfytryfyfywryfytry fy kvyzlpwa2jjjtznvsjn5lwixmfpmvllqlud1tvnqczjroxbjywzzmmpouen1lvm1allazlazlnwdmt gzhl2edhdowjwctqyceltbuxeeglvmuxnsgjlu3zsq2hmtxbhq2fozlfpexd2ee90yxi？oc = 5“ target =“ _ blank”>随着死亡人数的上升，Gazans开始寻找食物＆nbsp; REUTERS 以色列将重点转移到伊朗，加沙的死亡人数越来越多 - 饥饿加深＆nbsp;＆nbsp; npr href =“ https://news.google.com/rss/articles/cbmirwfbvv95cuxnu2nxttti1wmyxblvwa1vkykdqamdqamrrzdnv0855afm085afm085afm085afm085afm afm085afm05afm05afm05afm afm afm afm085afm085afm fm LJRU5SVURUC2V6elllQMXPVZFUWM1TYNFJKNKH3U3ZFA0LHVMXKDJBDJBLZG1HLWMWOERFDMUTBGL6 NVZLZ0tPQVd5eVFN0gG0AUFVX3lxTE03dUFRUHd1R29TQko5Z01oRDAwREZlOWtxenZkYXZPcFlkOUEwRER0ejR2X1R3WXp6N1prZHJoSEF6V3g3WDM3Mk9kS2FHX3E1d0ZtQk tMMl95WkhjRE9xUUZOdG9xZjduTFlNbTNSbERra3RISkp5VG1ZcGp0ZDFoZzRNNF93WWxQeFVweW9JM3gyQl9pa1Q0a1dmNlRwMS1PY3cwWjZFLVVlWkFLblR0cGVIbg?oc=5" target =“ _空白”>以色列攻击杀死至少92人，包括加沙的援助者＆nbsp; nbsp; al Jazeera href =“ https://news.google.com/rss/articles/cbmirgjbvv95cuxqls1kafbouzdilwmxtdjbng5tzjdhb3h3tzjdh3tfbppntfbpntdzltdzltdzltdzltvfrth2bzn2bzn2bzn2bzn2s3b yzwdlbvffuxwalfecww1sk4wytdgtevxyun2swdzadhkvm9mrkpvn3pfclowwnzetwnzetw1swfpdr3bprw5ob0jbzdzdzln1dfa2fa2fapdr3bprw5bprw5bppra2fa KXTMFIDTE5EVDUWWPTZGTWZUXLDWHXM2D0RWHTLU5GYNZJT1ZOBDYYEGDMSULXRMPUQXLMPUQXLX2HKVMXKQKQUNHZEKQUNHZE00UGXVNJVNJVSEKT4NFLHCDLCETNVAK1IC gdjefe3owpaq1zecgizvfhjajg3t2o0lvfha2nzmem2vf9pv05vltz2bjbjbvckr5zzfdddwntvv81rkdgeemm3szc3yznmrk91b055llcm91b05lcm9gnge？oc = 5' Target =“ _ Blank”>超过80多个Gazans被以色列大火杀害，全球重点转移到伊朗战争＆nbsp; nbsp; haaretz

item.title: 波音787 Crash：我们知道和接下来会发生什么 - 巴伦的
item.description: 波音787崩溃：我们知道的以及接下来的 href =“ https://news.google.com/rss/articles/cbmiwkfvx3lxte9pavjpmu4ydlpls2rmb1fnovdqwfz6 luj5dvnnz1plbl9kdghar0xly3rdm​​09ayuhwekmxc1bku2xswmdjmdjmu5qataxz2ncmlpiug5cotjmbghyuq？oc = 5“ target =“ _ blank”>印度航空说，撞车飞机上的一台引擎是新的＆nbsp;＆nbsp; bbc 独家|波音787的应急动力系统可能在印度航空崩溃之前可能活动＆nbsp; wsj 起飞，五月天的电话和两名从未回家的飞行员href =“ https://news.google.com/rss/articles/cbmikwfbvv95cuxqvhpyotc3x0jvgm4sgtxvuhvvjuzrms4hahutumms4hahutummg3bgnadnqwmmzbvmmzbvtdcn0fxenii ffxeniioud tuhjjcut0butiwi14ajzzcdkzefvdzmjxc3pvtzvzqnb6wl96tw03slnhcnhiz3rkowdwlunblxa1rvzjrnblxa1rvzjrnpim target =“ _ blank”>印度空气崩溃强调了国家基础设施繁荣的风险＆nbsp; nbsp; 《华盛顿邮报》

item.title: 俄罗斯警告伊朗的丛林核电站罢工可能造成“切尔诺贝利风格的灾难” - 路透社
item.description: 俄罗斯警告伊朗的丛林核电站罢工可能会导致'Chernobyl Style Capastrophe' href =“ https://news.google.com/rss/articles/cbmipafbvv95cuxoyjn6uulsvdlbv1vlbv1vlb1axexpluxd3qu1xowx0mjpvf9f9f9fnnw9hsjrkquff1awd2vehnb3k3spbl9spbl9 Zpbl9pbl9pbl9pbl9pbl9pbl9pbl9pbl9pbl9pbl9pbl9pbl9 BOMW0ZCS1NS1NZRU9TLVHTX0T1YTNUMLQ0T3JIELJIELJWTHZWNKZXNJRJRJRJRJZWXQVXQVXPTPTMJHYC01 wrxgtyu5qmjlvy3j3wwqwci1vsxvsvsvsovzfnghcbvizajfrnhfnhfwzdb0zmhrtxr0cw？oc = 5“ target =“ _空白”>伊朗政权崩溃对俄罗斯来说是严重打击＆nbsp; nbsp; 守护者 为什么俄罗斯不捍卫伊朗？ href =“ https://news.google.com/rss/articles/cbmitafbvv95cuxpuhdbwwvrnzhmtdq4blr5qvrsymhpwg52sdjv2jv2sdjv2sdjv2sdjvr4ztztztzymxotbghghddtrttrmcfmcfmcfmcfmcfmcfmcfmcfmcfmcfmcfmcfmcfmcfmcfmcfmcfmcfmcfmcfmcnvmcntlmcrmcrmcrmcn tlmcfmcfmcfmctrm u1 LWAVD6QK8TRNPOBHVSAWLKUGPAV2LHT1KXA3RJM3RJM3IZDUE2WJ1U0R6MEZLQVHVQMI3AT LWDK5LS19YQVHRVZMZOWDTEJRXMFRANUXGMDFLMUQ4OGO4TW03Q2RTS3HTYL9MRMZ0YNB ROWRGdmRwZENKbFXSAboBQVVfeXFMUDNVbmdON3VTdVExbW55ZkhnN2pacmMxVHVGQU53R2tlUF9iQzhsVzgyXzZheExoYXF6eDhUekh5RUU1b3Z3WXVYdmtpYUJKcWdERDMyWm5W wngttw9prjk0bhdhmnlkmzf4mepsmfjnnktbmziwmxdhoevfduvza1dbrjn33odzgd09jq zk4uwncmnb4whbkugy4d0jynxfjc0pdekjdynvimhvpzlroywfnb1vvbve2ogvb？oc = 5“ target =“ _ blank”>普京拒绝有关杀死伊朗的Khamenei的任何潜在尝试的问题href =“ https://news.google.com/rss/articles/cbmilwfbvv95cuxpv0utqulzqulzqxzjbu9yzffhmxb3retqzzzzzzzzzzzzzzv3rkxtd2vywghgabauvny1n5u2i1njfbbbbbbbbbbbbbbbbbbewfppppqq q 1V3cW51RmtkY284QmVwa24xQ1BxT3hhTGdOeF9aazdZajZadW1mcWxIX3FHcHo4dDV4U1QzN3NGNUE2OS05MnNuN2doRk8zYkpMU25OS0VzZ1dzb3QzclVLWnBZ?oc=5" target =“ _ blank”>当特朗普认为罢工伊朗时，俄罗斯警告世界是'毫米'，远离核灾难＆nbsp;＆nbsp; 6f6f6f“> time杂志

item.title: 卢旺达和刚果博士同意和平协议草案以结束冲突-BBC
item.description: 卢旺达和刚果博士同意和平协议草案以结束冲突＆nbsp; bbc 非洲永远的战争能否最终结束？ href =“ https://news.google.com/rss/articles/cbmikafbvv95cuxqmlhin2uyevjxtjxtjlodvbjls1ieno0bwvksuvksuvprtl2eddrslfslfslfslfslfsruy1nf nflwfzddn3z2thcthyugvoszj5yjrdvicmfvt0zqy0zqy0nqt3nynxf1mmxydg9gvdrcsnrpr0rjogz3s1bwdgrjhha1v4og1v4og16am5prwdyyxrettz ptdh4bmd3rmzevftsazybqvvfexfmt2hrchjlttvcmfixodlpvefpvefpvpvwxrrudsdmnvnzbmsxjjykh334dmtcmtcugnvywxugnvywxugnvywxuvlhfcudlhfcudydjhuczdgzdgzdgzxxd1 DVBJBVG0WVHQS3PVYKIXTKVYYURNMU1GYKJ3MWJLWWDJDKJAX0XZYTNQAWHRU3FGQVNVRUMTZJDTNTGNTGKZMMWHWTTNTGKZMWHWTKLPEUC0DLBUZ2PRXPRX1PRX1PRX1PRX1PRX1PPRXPRXPRXPRXPRXPRRR？ target =“ _ blank”>刚果博士和卢旺达标志草案和平协议＆nbsp;＆nbsp; al Jazeera 关于刚果民主共和国与卢旺达共和国之间的和平谈判的联合声明，由美国调解，由卡塔尔州观察到＆nbsp; nbsp; 美国。国务院（.gov） 美国。经纪人在刚果民主共和国和卢旺达之间进行交易，以结束有关矿产财富的战争＆nbsp; nbsp; CBS News
